features: 🥇【HOTWAV 2023 Newest rugged tablet with IP68 IP69K & MIL-STD-810H Certified】HOTWAV R6 Ultra - Latest rugged android tablet from HOTWAV! Equipped with Android 13 system,16GB(8GB Virtual)+256GB,10.4 inch 2K FHD+ Corning Gorilla Glass 3 (Scratch Resistant) , HOTWAV R6 Ultra waterproof rugged tablet pc meets the military standard of MIL-STD-810G, also IP68 and IP69K certified. Perfect for cleaners, farm workers, foresters, miners and construction workers. The best rugged tablet in 2023.

🔥【 2K FHD+, 10.4 inch Upgrade Corning Gorilla Glass 3】HOTWAV R6 Ultra rugged tablet pc has a 10.4 inch 2K screen, which equips the rugged tablet with good brightness, high contrast, strong sense of hierarchy and vivid colors. The10.4 inch 2K FHD+ screen with a resolution of 1200(RGB)×2000 and a brightness of 450 NIT offers you a broader visual experience.

🚀【16GB RAM + 256GB ROM, Android 13 tablet】HOTWAV R6 Ultra android 13 rugged tablet comes with 16GB RAM (8GB Virtual) and 256GB storage .The Large storage can fully meet your daily entertainment and work. It is aslo Equipped with MT6771 octa-core processor, Media and gaming are fast, you won't have any stress multi-tasking,playing and downloading. The latest Android 13 lets you switch quickly and smoothly between different apps, also protect your privacy.

🏆【15600mAh Large Battery, Power Saving, OTG】 This Rugged Android Tablet comes with 15600mAh battery, which supports 900 hours standby, 30 hours video, 60 hours talk. This rugged Tablet has a power saving mode, you can enable this mode saves to more battery capacity. Equipped with 9V2.2A (19.8W) fast charging function, this rugged tablet pc also supports OTG reverse charging , like a large capacity mobile power supply, this HOTWAV R6 Ultra rugged tablet android can charge your phone at any time.

🌐【4G Dual SIM, -40℃ to 75℃ for Extreme Environment+16MP Rear Camera&16MP HD Front Camera】HOTWAV R6 Ultra 4G Outdoor tablet is a global android tablet covering all major network operators in Europe, Asia and America. Eliminate the need for an alternate cell phone when traveling around the world. With a wide operating temperature range of -30°C to 75°C, the HOTWAV R6 Ultra dual sim waterproof tablets suitable for a variety of outdoor environments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable; great audio/video; fast performance even when multitasking or gaming; superb battery life
reviews.reviewText: I needed a travel tablet that I could be rough with, emulate some 6th-gen games on, and use as a laptop replacement for writing and research work, some light music-production sketching, and to watch a few shows on. I went for the HOTWAV R6 because it’s ruggedized, it has a chipset I’m pretty familiar with the performance of (Mediatek 6771), and it has a nice hardware profile and great screen resolution.At the outset, buyers should know that this tablet isn’t lightweight; it’s built to be handled roughly, dropped, exposed to elements and worked hard in hard conditions. It’s thick and hearty, but it feels tough and compact and it’s withstood my abuse during a handful of road excursions. It comes with a durable removable screw-mounted hand-strap that I don’t use but that is a nice option for field users. Mine also came with two removable screen protectors, though the screen is itself pretty scratch-resistant.The picture is really nice: sharp with vivid color and good saturation. The screen’s high resolution makes images, video and text look lively and stand out boldly. Its outdoor performance is the best of any tablet I’ve owned, and it’s totally serviceable as a field tablet in this regard.Performance is great—quick and zippy with no lag or bottlenecks navigating Android or apps, even with numerous apps running. I’ve had issues with lower-specced Android devices showing excessive latency with MIDI devices in music-composition software, but the R6 cuts right through that work.While I’m on the topic of music production, I’ll address the R6’s audio: this is a great sonic performer. Sound is loud but clear, and the stereo speakers have impressed me—excellent stereo separation for a device of this size.Game performance is as-expected for this chipset—upper-mid-range and it’ll run most native Android titles, many at high settings. The most demanding game I ran on it is GRID Autosport, which it handled without issue.Game emulation tops out at Dreamcast for system-wide performance, but it’ll run a good few Gamecube titles and a handful of PS2 with some tweaking. PSP performance is also pretty solid, with only a few of the known demanding titles I tried (the God of War games and a few racing games) wading into unplayable territory.Battery life has been very impressive so far; I’ve been able to go four days on a charge a few times, with moderate use (including game-playing) over that time.SUMMARY: I’m very satisfied with my R6; its performance and utility is on-point for a tablet at its price point, and the fact that it’s ruggedized gives it great value in this range. I’ll recommend it for anyone needing a tough, durable tablet with solid performance and multi-tasking that can be used reliably in non-ideal conditions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Rugged, Waterproof Tablet Perfect for Outside Work
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Watch my unboxing and setup video!About a year ago I bought the R5 rugged tablet and I've been very happy with it. Recently I decided to upgrade to the new R6 because of the many improvements that had been made, and I gave my old R5 to my girlfriend.Here are the differences between the previous R5 model and R6 Ultra：1. Operating system: R5 uses Android 12 and R6 Ultra uses Android 132. Screen sizes: R5 has 10.1 inch and R6 Ultra has 10.4 inch3. Screen resolution: R5 HD+ (1280*800), R6 Ultra 2K screen (2000*1200)4. Storage: R5 - 4GB RAM, R6 Ultra - 16GB RAM (8GB Virtual) + 256 GB ROM, SD Up to 2TB5 The R6 comes with an additional screen protector that was not included with the previous R5 model.The tablet was a snap to setup. When I first bought the R5, I transferred all of my apps and data easily from my Samsung phone to the tablet very easily. It was just as easy to transfer all of my apps and data from the older R5 tablet to my new R6. Everything went as smooth as silk. See my video.* The speed of this tablet is incredibly snappy FAST when using web browsers.* The screen resolution is amazing for watching videos.* The sound quality of the internal speaker is very good, but you can easily connect it to an external speaker.* It has a SIM card slot, and I've got mine subscribed to T-Mobile for Internet access.Durability:This tablet is incredibly rugged and could probably be used by the military under battlefield conditions. Still I am careful with mine because no tablet is indestructible. The R6 includes a plastic adhesive screen protector, a wipe to clean your screen, and another wipe to dry it. Be careful not to overlook the screen protector in the box because it looks like part of the packaging. You'll notice in my video I show the wipes but I don't mention the screen protector. The reason was because I discovered the screen protector AFTER I made the video. :-)The tablet is on the heavy side, but that's because of the huge battery. Also you can use the tablet to charge your phone and other devices.Great tablet, but I have one minor complaint. They really need to add a shoulder strap in addition to the hand strap. It would make it lot easier to carry it while inside an airport when you need more than two hands to keep up with all of your other stuff.Overall, I'm extremely happy with this tablet and will most likely buy another upgraded model in the future.

I would like to say, this is the most advanced cellular tablet I have owned and operated. Great speed over cellular. Had an issue with the screen protector and the seller solved the issue within hours. Very positive and friendly service. Will recommend sales and service of this HOT new company that's on the rise.
All looks good, except screen protection- that one been cracked upon arrival. If possible, I would get replacement. Otherwise it's damaged on the edge, I will still use it.

What can I say, almost everything perfect for what I'm looking for! I take care of my tools but I am a technician, and an outdoors adventurer, so I need tough. The Hotwav R6 Pro feels tough, love the handstrap to keep a better grip on it, its a bit on the heavy side but thats ALL BATTERY! Initial 6 days of constant upgrades and uploads of my data and apps, I installed a 512GB microSD card and my cell phone carrier's SIM card, calls are crisp and clear on speaker and on my bluetooth headset that I normally use and it was still at 60% battery! Video and pictures are crisp and clean, and GPS data is one of the most accurate I have seen in a phone or tablet!No need for a manual, startup was a breeze following the on-screen prompts, Android 12 was a bit of a learning curve for me but its all there with some newer stuff new to me. What few questions I had were quickly answered by Hotwav Customer Service via e-mail, they're one of the best customer services I've seen, very fast replies! I'm very happy and will be watching to see what else they come up with next!

reviews.reviewTitle: ottima qualità salvaguardata da una perfetta protezione
reviews.reviewText: Avendo necessità di utilizzare un tablet in cantiere mi sono dato aiuto cercando un prodotto rugged.Ho trovato un dispositivo che non teme la pioggia, la salsedine, a polvere, come gli urti e le cadute. Il sogno elettronico, divenuto finalmente realtà. Negli ultimi anni gli avanzamenti della ricerca, hanno permesso la progettazione e lo sviluppo di supporti dalle caratteristiche speciali ma questo le supera tutte.Capita spesso di cadermi dalle mani oppure che si sgretola dell'intonaco sopra oppure che gli cade un pò di impasto di cemento sopra ma con un pò d'acqua si pulisce tutto e rimane sempre operativo.C'era un modello più economico ma ho scelto questo per garantirmi una buona memoria e altre caratteristiche tecnologiche che sono descritte.Mi sono trovato bene e funziona tutto regolarmente la batteria ha una lunga durata anche se i tempi di ricarica ovviamente sono più lunghi rispetto i tablet normali, questo è veramente una potenza.Sono rimasto sorpreso dalle prestazioni veramente ottimali.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tolles Jedermann-Tablet (auch für den Outdoor Bereich)
reviews.reviewText: Guten Tag,Ich habe das Tablet für mich als iPad-Alternative mit Android Betriebssystem gekauft, um im Internet zu surfen, spiele zu spielen und Zeitung zu lesen.Wichtig war mir insbesondere auch eine lange Akkulaufzeit und eine gewisse Schmutzresistenz da ich das Tablet auch gern zum wandern mitnehmen möchte. Der sehr große Akku fasst über 15000mah, damit komme ich doch einige Tage zurecht, was mir sehr gut gefällt.Das Tablet läuft recht flüssig und fix, wirkt zudem stabil und die Auflösung ist auch ganz gut. Lediglich die lange Ladezeit könnte man noch besser lösen.Alles in allem bin ich mit dem Kauf sehr glücklich und kann es durchaus empfehlen.Herzliche Grüße
